      mouseEventFirst - First mouse click
      mouseEventSecond - Second mouse click

    • controlMatches

      public boolean controlMatches()
      Check if there are 3 same color stones next to each other.
      Returns:
      true if there are 3 same color stones next to each other

    • ControlInit

      private void ControlInit()
      When initialize Check if there are 3 same color stones next to each other.

    • controlMatchTiles

      private void controlMatchTiles(CharacterMonsterCreat[] arr, String[] textArr)
      On the updated board, the stones that match three of the same color are deleted and the scrolling process takes place from below. Damage is applied to the corresponding monster accordingly.
      Parameters:
      arr - Includes characters and monsters on the board.
      textArr - String array to write Text Area

    • HealthUpdate

      private void HealthUpdate(CharacterMonsterCreat[] arr, int index_x, int index_y, int control, String[] textArr)
      The corresponding monster's health is reduced. If the health is zero, the damage action is not applied.
      Parameters:
      arr - Includes characters and monsters on the board.
      index_x - index x
      index_y - index y
      control - Checking how many stones match
      textArr - String array to write Text Area

    • scrollColumn1

      Parameters:

      index_j - index j
